channel.title: Unable to play offline. 3.2 & 4.1
channel.description:
Hi. I really want to play Moparscape 3.2 just to remind myself of the old days.. the old graphics. I enjoyed playing 3.2 back when I had Win XP. It worked perfectly on there.
Yesterday I redownloaded 3.2. I have Win Vista SP2 32-bit. I opened Mopar and clicked "Start Server". I then entered my username and password. I got this error:
[code]Your account is already logged in. Try again right now, or make another username[/code]
[code][11:33:32] Logging into (please2, *****) [11:33:32] Your UID is: 98093268 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50198 Did not save for please2 Server: ClientHandler: Client please2 disconnected. [11:33:46] Couldn't open output stream to log file please2-20100925.log [11:33:46] [11:33:46] Logging into (please2, *****) [11:33:46] Your UID is: 52676655 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50199 Did not save for please2 Server: ClientHandler: Client please2 disconnected. [/code]
I keep making usernames.. random usernames. Still the same error. I tried changing the port from 43594 to something random (ie 5555) but still the same error. What seems to be prevalent is the "[b]Couldn't open output stream to log file[/b]" error.
I thought maybe it's my firewall fucking it up. So I completely uninstalled my firewall and disabled my anti-virus. Guess what? same problem. Then I restarted my computer and unplugged my internet. Unable to login. I also tried to run the batch file as admin, but the same problem still.
This also happens with the web client.
I tried to download some other servers but still the same problem.
EDIT: [size=24pt]NEVERMIND. TURNED USER ACCOUNT CONTROL OFF AND THAT SHIT WORKED JUST FINE. FUCKING VISTA[/size]
Any help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Unable to play offline. 3.2 & 4.1
item.dc:creator: @Rare_z Rare z
item.description:
@Rare_z wrote:

Hi. I really want to play Moparscape 3.2 just to remind myself of the old days… the old graphics. I enjoyed playing 3.2 back when I had Win XP. It worked perfectly on there.

Yesterday I redownloaded 3.2. I have Win Vista SP2 32-bit. I opened Mopar and clicked “Start Server”. I then entered my username and password. I got this error:

Your account is already logged in. Try again right now, or make another username

[11:33:32] Logging into (please2, *****) [11:33:32] Your UID is: 98093268 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50198 Did not save for please2 Server: ClientHandler: Client please2 disconnected. [11:33:46] Couldn't open output stream to log file please2-20100925.log [11:33:46] [11:33:46] Logging into (please2, *****) [11:33:46] Your UID is: 52676655 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50199 Did not save for please2 Server: ClientHandler: Client please2 disconnected.

I keep making usernames… random usernames. Still the same error. I tried changing the port from 43594 to something random (ie 5555) but still the same error. What seems to be prevalent is the “Couldn’t open output stream to log file” error.

I thought maybe it’s my firewall fucking it up. So I completely uninstalled my firewall and disabled my anti-virus. Guess what? same problem. Then I restarted my computer and unplugged my internet. Unable to login. I also tried to run the batch file as admin, but the same problem still.

This also happens with the web client.

I tried to download some other servers but still the same problem.

EDIT: [size=24pt]NEVERMIND. TURNED USER ACCOUNT CONTROL OFF AND THAT SHIT WORKED JUST FINE. FUCKING VISTA[/size]

Any help is greatly appreciated.
